title: Classic Spaghetti Bolognese
description: A traditional Italian pasta dish with rich meat sauce.
instructions: Cook spaghetti according to package instructions.
Heat olive oil in a pan over medium heat.
Add onion and garlic; sauté until translucent.
Add minced beef; cook until browned.
Stir in tomatoes and tomato paste; simmer for 15 minutes.
Season with salt and pepper.
Serve sauce over spaghetti and garnish with basil leaves.

title: Vegetable Stir-Fry
description: A quick and healthy stir-fry with fresh vegetables.
instructions: Heat sesame oil in a wok over high heat.
Add garlic and ginger; stir-fry for 30 seconds.
Add vegetables; stir-fry for 5-7 minutes.
Add soy sauce; toss to coat.
Season with salt and pepper.
Serve hot over steamed rice.

title: Chicken Caesar Salad
description: A classic Caesar salad topped with grilled chicken.
instructions: Season chicken with salt and pepper; grill until cooked through.
Chop lettuce and place in a large bowl.
Slice grilled chicken and add to the lettuce.
Add croutons and Parmesan cheese.
Drizzle with Caesar dressing; toss to combine.
Serve immediately.

title: Banana Smoothie
description: A creamy and healthy banana smoothie.
instructions: Place all ingredients in a blender.
Blend until smooth.
Pour into glasses and serve immediately.

title: Classic Cheeseburger
description: A juicy beef burger with cheese and classic toppings.
instructions: Season ground beef with salt and pepper; form into 4 patties.
Heat oil in a pan or grill over medium-high heat.
Cook patties for 4-5 minutes per side or until desired doneness.
Place a slice of cheese on each patty; let melt.
Assemble burgers with buns, patties, and toppings.
Serve hot.

title: Greek Salad
description: A refreshing salad with cucumbers, tomatoes, and feta cheese.
instructions: In a large bowl, combine cucumbers, tomatoes, onion, and olives.
In a small bowl, whisk together olive oil, vinegar, oregano, salt, and pepper.
Pour dressing over the salad; toss to combine.
Add feta cheese on top.
Serve chilled.

title: Chocolate Chip Cookies
description: Classic homemade cookies loaded with chocolate chips.
instructions: Preheat oven to 350°F (175°C).
Cream together butter and sugars.
Beat in eggs and vanilla.
In a separate bowl, combine flour, baking soda, and salt.
Gradually mix dry ingredients into wet ingredients.
Stir in chocolate chips.
Drop by spoonfuls onto baking sheets.
Bake for 10-12 minutes or until golden brown.
Cool on wire racks.

title: Vegan Lentil Soup
description: A hearty and nutritious lentil soup.
instructions: Heat olive oil in a large pot over medium heat.
Add onion, carrots, celery; sauté until softened.
Add garlic; cook for 1 minute.
Add lentils, broth, cumin, bay leaf, salt, and pepper.
Bring to a boil; reduce heat and simmer for 30-40 minutes.
Remove bay leaf; serve hot.

title: Pancakes
description: Fluffy homemade pancakes perfect for breakfast.
instructions: In a bowl, sift together flour, baking powder, salt, and sugar.
Make a well in the center; pour in milk, egg, and melted butter.
Mix until smooth.
Heat a lightly oiled griddle over medium-high heat.
Pour batter onto the griddle; cook until golden brown on both sides.
Serve hot with syrup.

title: Caprese Salad
description: A simple Italian salad with tomatoes, mozzarella, and basil.
instructions: Arrange tomato and mozzarella slices on a platter, alternating between them.
Tuck basil leaves between slices.
Drizzle with olive oil and balsamic vinegar if using.
Season with salt and pepper.
Serve immediately.

title: Grilled Salmon
description: Simple grilled salmon with lemon and herbs.
instructions: Preheat grill to medium heat.
Brush salmon with olive oil; season with salt and pepper.
Place lemon slices and herbs on top of salmon.
Grill for 6-8 minutes per side or until cooked through.
Serve with additional lemon wedges.

title: Strawberry Smoothie
description: A refreshing strawberry smoothie.
instructions: Combine all ingredients in a blender.
Blend until smooth.
Pour into glasses and enjoy.

title: Quinoa Salad
description: A healthy quinoa salad with vegetables and a lemon dressing.
instructions: Rinse quinoa under cold water.
In a saucepan, combine quinoa and water; bring to a boil.
Reduce heat; simmer for 15 minutes or until water is absorbed.
Let quinoa cool.
In a large bowl, combine quinoa, vegetables, and parsley.
In a small bowl, whisk together olive oil, lemon juice, salt, and pepper.
Pour dressing over salad; toss to combine.
Serve chilled or at room temperature.

title: French Toast
description: Classic French toast with a hint of cinnamon.
instructions: In a shallow bowl, whisk together eggs, milk, vanilla, and cinnamon.
Dip bread slices into the mixture, coating both sides.
Heat butter in a skillet over medium heat.
Cook bread slices until golden brown on both sides.
Serve hot with maple syrup if desired.

title: Chicken Curry
description: A flavorful chicken curry with spices and coconut milk.
instructions: Heat oil in a pot over medium heat.
Add onion and garlic; sauté until soft.
Add curry powder and turmeric; cook for 1 minute.
Add chicken; cook until browned.
Add tomatoes and coconut milk.
Simmer for 20-25 minutes until chicken is cooked through.
Season with salt and pepper.
Garnish with cilantro and serve with rice.

title: Guacamole
description: A classic avocado dip with lime and cilantro.
instructions: Mash avocados in a bowl.
Add lime juice, onion, tomatoes, garlic, and cilantro.
Mix well; season with salt and pepper.
Serve with tortilla chips.

title: Berry Parfait
description: A layered dessert with yogurt, granola, and fresh berries.
instructions: In serving glasses, layer yogurt, granola, and berries.
Repeat layers as desired.
Drizzle with honey if using.
Serve immediately.

title: Garlic Bread
description: Crispy bread slices with garlic butter.
instructions: Preheat oven to 350°F (175°C).
Slice baguette diagonally.
In a bowl, mix butter, garlic, parsley, and a pinch of salt.
Spread garlic butter on each bread slice.
Place on a baking sheet; bake for 10-12 minutes until golden.
Serve warm.

title: Tomato Soup
description: A warm and comforting tomato soup.
instructions: Heat oil in a pot over medium heat.
Add onion and garlic; sauté until soft.
Add tomatoes, broth, and sugar.
Bring to a boil; reduce heat and simmer for 15 minutes.
Blend soup until smooth.
Season with salt and pepper.
Garnish with basil leaves and serve.

title: Mushroom Risotto
description: Creamy risotto with mushrooms and Parmesan cheese.
instructions: Heat olive oil and 1 tbsp butter in a pan.
Add onion and garlic; sauté until translucent.
Add mushrooms; cook until soft.
Add rice; stir to coat grains.
Pour in wine; cook until absorbed.
Add broth one ladle at a time, stirring constantly until absorbed before adding more.
Continue until rice is creamy and al dente.
Stir in remaining butter and Parmesan cheese.
Season with salt and pepper.
Garnish with parsley and serve.
